BEACH CLUB BARBERSHOP

Landing page
about the project

Through selling excellent personal service and comfort with professional results, we thoroughly cover the barbershop experience for the customer. Combined with a clear list of services to let the customer pick and choose with little hassle.

Industry: barber shop

Tech Stack: Project management, Back-end development, Ux/ui Designer, Front-end development, QA, DevOps

How it works

Select the type of haircut you would like to get

mobile version

On our mobile version, we make sure to make all the options and prices clear and accessible. This makes it easy to schedule and plan on the go for the first and future visits.

Result

We make it easy and appealing to schedule a professional visit to the barbers. Through the website styling we sell the professionalism and results of the service and cover all the services openly. Combined, this ensures that the client feels confident about the choice they make.
